description: My first experience in big tech!
Worked in a (at the time) new org called DataZone, a data governance platform for AWS
Main project was inconsequential, but I got to do some cool stuff with Roaring Bitmaps in Go at the end of my time there
Was a noob, but I learned a lot about programming ðŸ˜…
Built an internal desktop application for defect tracking in C#
Got hella interested in databases and did infra work under Prof. Aaron Elmore
TAed a couple times for CMSC 23500 / 33550 undergrad + grad database systems
Worked in the research group at a hedgefund solving problems at the intersection of engineering and finance
Walked around everywhere with a notebook because laptops weren't allowed in meetings for security reasons :(
Participated in daily standups where we weren't allowed to sit down :(
Took some time off school to work at Notion in the fall
Got to work on a bunch of cool stuff in the storage infrastructure domain
Met a ton of super cool people
Did a small part-time gig at UChicago IoP
Created a pipeline for extracting and logging info from political flyers to identify false citations
